problem.markdown: >>Pick the trajectory that best fits the situation described.<< ( ) (x) ( ) ( ) [explanation] Plot B. Let’s describe each state between actions (as denoted by the red circles): 0) Both tanks at full, and thus we begin at the top right corner. 1) B1 remains full and B2 is slightly less than full. 2) B1 slightly less than full and B2 full. 3) B1 has completely emptied and B2 still full. 4) B1 and B2 both empty. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick the trajectory that best fits the situation described.

div.p: Plot B. Let’s describe each state between actions (as denoted by the red circles): 0) Both tanks at full, and thus we begin at the top right corner. 1) B1 remains full and B2 is slightly less than full. 2) B1 slightly less than full and B2 full. 3) B1 has completely emptied and B2 still full. 4) B1 and B2 both empty.
